item.description:
EVENT: Join us for a moderate hike with surprisingly good views for a relatively low climb on the Welch Dickey loop near Waterville Valley in the White Mountains. (http://www.fs.fed.us/...) Forecast of moderate to heavy rain will cancel. If you have not hiked recently, please call or e-mail TC early.

BRING/WEAR: Hiking boots highly recommended as well as warm clothes, rain jacket, trail lunch/snacks and full water bottles.
Trip's Coordinator: Michael Fuchs mifuchs@comcast.net
RSVP: by July 8 is required (Minimum of 6 participants is necessary)
MEET: Email TC, West of Boston area carpool meeting time will be 7 AM or meet at Welch Dickey trailhead at 9:30.
COST: Carpooling, snack money following Hike, plus $5 for nonmembers
item.how_to_find_us: Contact the trip's coordinator, Michael Fuchs mifuchs@comcast.net for details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Welch Dickey Hike in the Whte Mountains
